function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Systematic review on the emergence and replicability of the virus and its association with weather factors","Impact":"Lack of understanding seasonal behavior of the virus, leading to ineffective health information system and public interventions to control the spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementation of efficient health information system with accurate public interventions to control the incidence and spread of COVID-19.","Technologies":"Health information system, data analytics for weather factors.","People":"General population at risk of inadequate public interventions.","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities."}]}
